scripts.setup:example: copy .env.example .env.local && echo ✅ .env.local created! Please edit it with your OAuth credentials.
scripts.check:python: python --version && python -c "import gradio; print('✅ Gradio', gradio.__version__, 'is installed')"
scripts.check:env: node -e "require('fs').existsSync('.env.local') ? console.log('✅ .env.local exists') : console.log('❌ .env.local not found')"
